metaData.title: A cryosauna machine is ideal for natural recovery. Buy cryosauna from THEC
metaData.description: Many hospitals want to buy cryosauna because it is extremely popular among clients. It provides an opportunity for natural recovery with supercooling. You can also burn calories and increase general wellness.

heading: CRYO°CABIN
caption: Accelerate your body’s natural recovery with super cooling.

whatIs.heading: What is Cryo°Cabin?
whatIs.slide1: Whole body cryotherapy is a three-minute treatment using extreme cold, via liquid nitrogen mist, on the body’s surface which in turn enhances positive effects on health and wellness, sports recovery, pain management and even beauty.
whatIs.slide2: This cabin will treat the whole body by exposing it to temperatures below -100C. The body will instinctively react by boosting its own healing abilities. The hormones and enzymes will be released so the body would recover in a more efficient way.
whatIs.slide3: This is unique equipment with a Nordic design and a huge 10’’ display for thermal images. Exterior and interior colors can be customized. This machine has been designed for all who want to become healthier and reduce pain in any part of the body.
whatIs.slide4: Spend around 3 minutes to acquire many health-enhancing benefits. You can use this machine for post-surgical healing, asthma treatment, different kinds of inflammations and even depression. The level of lactic acid will be drastically decreased as well.

specs.spec7: Outflow temperature -20°C with actual heat extraction capacity of -60°C
specs.spec15: Power supply 220V AC 50Hz. 110V AC 60Hz (Available as custom order)

card1.title: Patented tech
card1.caption: Vortex cooling makes the vapor flow around the body, instead of directly at the body.

card2.title: Gas efficient
card2.caption: Regulated valve control system means less consumption for the average session.

card3.title: Wireless
card3.caption: Support, maintenance and remote diagnostics through WIFI.

card4.title: Advanced safety
card4.caption: Ultrasonic head sensor, dual emergency shut-off, active circulation and active ventilation.

point1.title: Health & Wellness
point1.caption: The extremely low temperatures in a whole body cryotherapy chamber enacts an amazing physiological response on the body.

point2.title: Sports & Fitness
point2.caption: Whole body cryotherapy acts at a muscular and cardiovascular level, therefore, when applied before intense exercise it increases physical performance and resistance.

point3.title: Beauty and weight loss
point3.caption: A WBC session can burn from 300 to 800 calories, depending on the physiological characteristics of each person.

healthSupport.title: Health support
healthSupport.caption: Exposing the whole body to sub zero temperatures reaching down to -160 degrees Celsius. This 3 minute session provides many health enhancing benefits, such as:
healthSupport.card1: Post surgical healing, asthma, joint inflammation, hormone deficiencies, depression, fatigue
healthSupport.card2: Reduces the levels of lactic acid in blood almost immediately to the normal levels
healthSupport.card3: Skin disorders like allergies and psoriasis

card1.title: Recovery after exercise
card1.description: As whole body cryotherapy helps to reduce inflammation, pain is reduced and the body is better able to heal itself and promote muscle recovery. Unlike with ice baths you can also resume exercise immediately after a cryotherapy session.

card2.title: Become calm and peaceful
card2.description: Cryotherapy influences the autonomic nervous system so a person can feel relaxation. This is a great tool for dealing with anxiety and depression. You can subject your body to the treatment on a daily basis just to reduce stress or cure a headache.

card3.title: Feel refreshed
card3.description: If cryotherapy sessions are applied to a body on a daily basis, this person would feel lasting positive effects due to the decrease in the stress hormone cortisol level. The more cryotherapy sessions the better you will feel after every treatment.

card4.title: More energy
card4.description: After the body has been exposed to low temperatures it will physiologically respond to it by trying to keep an average temperature. The nervous system will activate a vasoconstriction process so the pains from the inflammations would be reduced.

card1.title: Achieve better results
card1.description: Cryotherapy helps muscles to become more adapted for the upcoming training. After a short cryo session, the blood flow will be increased. Enzymes, nutrients and hormones will be released into the blood system so the athlete can become stronger and faster.

card2.title: Faster recovery after training
card2.description: After almost every training certain areas of a body experience inflammations. But the pain can be dramatically reduced – cryotherapy also helps muscles to recover. On the next day, you will feel more energetic and healthy.

card3.title: Faster trauma recovery
card3.description: Almost in every sport, there is a chance to get a trauma. The cryo treatment session will significantly reduce the time needed to soothe the inflammation. The pain will be gone in a minute and the muscles start to regenerate much faster.

card4.title: Emotional stability
card4.description: After the treatment has started the endorphins and neuropeptides are generated so a person would feel a feeling of calmness, relief, joy and contentment. It is very important for the athlete to create a positive state of mind.

card1.title: Boost the caloric burn
card1.description: Even after the first session, an average person will be able to burn 300-800 calories depending on the physiological specifications of a body. If you will combine cryotherapy with proper physical training, the result will be formidable.

card2.title: Reduce cellulite symptoms
card2.description: After the skin and the whole body have been subjected to the cool air the blood circulation will be increased. The tissue irrigation will be improved so the fat level from the lymphatic system will slowly decrease. Just perform the procedure on a daily basis.

card3.title: Toxin level reduction
card3.description: Blood circulation increase will promote cellular exchange so the toxins will be eliminated faster and more efficiently. You will become healthier just by subjecting yourself to cryotherapy treatment on a daily basis. The healing effect is great.

card4.title: Skin regeneration
card4.description: The extreme temperatures of the cryotherapy equipment will boost blood circulation and collagen generation. The skin will become firm and more elastic due to the natural renewing process. After a few treatment procedures, you will look slightly younger.

businessSolutions.heading: Business Solutions
businessSolutions.line1: We offer your business a complete solution when you buy your CTN Cryocabin from us.
businessSolutions.line2: We deliver and install your equipment and in addition to this we’ve have had help from our own interiour designer in order to provide you with a complete package with materials to create the spacial room needed for the true Cryocabin-experience. Walls, Roll-ups, flooring, stools etc. This toghether with printed information folders to give your customers first class information.
businessSolutions.line3: Everything included in the price and help your business get started and increase sales, straight away.

studies.heading: Whole-body cryotherapy studies
studies.caption: The history of whole-body cryotherapy (WBC) originates from Japan in 1978 when Dr Yamaguchi started using freezing treatments of short duration on his patients skin to treat rheumatoid arthritis for pain relief purposes. The same principle was then used in Europe where ”Cryocabins” were developed to treat the whole body more efficiently.
